document_data.name: Eldath's Patch
document_data.mainbody: '''Eldath's Patch''' was a vacant lot in [[Neverwinter]] as of {{yearlink|1370}}.
document_data.Description: It was the last vacant lot in Neverwinter's [[Silverlade Street]]. There were [[blueleaf]] [[tree]]s growing on it, and it was bordered on its north end by the walls of the [[Melaraunt]] family gardens. There was a marker on the lot showing it was consecrated to [[Eldath]].
document_data.History: Eldath's Patch had a [[refuge]] added upon it during the reign of [[Magister]] [[Maldiglas Turntower]] at its north end, where the blueleaf trees grew thickest. By the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, it was so popular with young lovers (and some nobility) that [[dog]]s had been banned from it, after some incidents.
